properties.address: East Sussex County Council, East Sussex BN1 9EW
properties.description: We are open to people of all ages. It is not necessary to be a library member to use our space and facilities. We offer books, newspapers, magazines and board games and puzzles for use in the library. We also have free wifi, public computers and free activities - please ask staff for details. If you want to use one of our pcs or borrow items to take home, you would need to become a library member. If the library is open but unstaffed - Libraries Extra, adults (16 years +) will need a Libraries Extra card to enter. To obtain your free Libraries Extra card visit the library on a staffed day with ID. Children can visit on Libraries Extra days if accompanied by an adult with a Libraries Extra card. https://www.brighton-hove.gov.uk/libraries-leisure-and-arts/libraries/directories/our-libraries-and-their-opening-times

properties.address: Old Boat Corner Community Association Ltd, East Sussex BN1 8GN
properties.description: Old Boat Corner is a home away from home, a place where you can relax, play and make mess, seek help, eat and drink, and enjoy the variety of activities and facilities readily available to all ages and abilities. Our event spaces host a range of private and community-run classes and groups, from mother and baby, soft play and arts and craft, to coffee mornings for the older generation, charitable fundraisers and a variety of sports groups. There is something for everyone. Most importantly the centre is a warm and welcoming place, where you can get information, knowledge, and help within a caring community space.
properties.title: Old Boat Corner Community Association

properties.title: Kingsfield Close, Southwick

properties.description: Our Community Hub at the Parish Hall be will open every Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday morning 10am –12pm where we will be serving light refreshments including tea, coffee, cakes, biscuits. There will be no charge for entry or refreshments, and we have a team of volunteers hosting the sessions. Every Tuesday afternoon you are welcome to join in on our free gentle fitness class 12.30pm – 1.30pm run by Lets Dance Sussex. We will also be hosting a week of Christmas activities including a family friendly film over the Christmas holiday plus much more from January, so do keep an eye on our Facebook page for more details. Everyone is welcome!
